data.actual_result: The push notification remains and you have to remove it yourself
data.expected_result: The push notification should be dismissed
data.short_description: After recovering from a crash, Discord won't dismiss push notifications upon viewing channel
data.steps_to_repro: - Close Discord - Get someone to DM you or mention you, in order to trigger a push notification - Open Discord, but don't open the channel you were mentionned in so the push notification is still here - Get Discord to crash (you can try to reproduce any crash bug reported recently since build 6.3.5, most of them are still valid in 6.3.6) - Re-open Discord, and open the channel you got mentionned in
